name: CCTV Heist
description:
A CCTV based stealth game where the player must steal a precious diamond from a museum, using the CCTV camera network to scout around, identify and ultimately steal their prize.

Developed at Melbourne Global Game Jam 2018: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/cctv-heist

Programming, Art & Design by Lachlan Morrow & Mitchell Johnson

Audio by Abbysynth
